articles.author: Myah Ward
articles.title: Poll: 51 percent of Americans support Trump's 2-year Facebook ban - POLITICO
articles.description: Facebook announced last week that Trump’s account will be suspended until at least 2023.
articles.content:
Independent voters were a mixed bag, with 46 percent supporting the suspension, and 40 percent opposing it.

articles.title: Beijing Winter Olympics ‘diplomatic boycott’ pushed across West - South China Morning Post
articles.description: China hawks across Europe and North America lend their voices to the clamour for a boycott of the Winter Olympics, to be held in Beijing next February.
